title: Build up your business with Prelo Lead Generation
content:
Savvy business owners know when to take a tool that will actually be useful to them. Prelo Standard Plan: Lifetime Subscription helps business owners with so many of the tasks that are either time-consuming or incredibly difficult to do without the right resources and for Green Monday, it’s on sale for $47.99 (Reg. $1800) with coupon code GREEN20. 

Prelo was made to be a B2B tool that helps with decision making, information gathering, and growing your business. Prelo helps you find clients who will actually stay with you, create a customer base, build your brand, and so much more. You get access to 40+ downloadable key decision-makers from tech companies. Plus you get funding data, LinkedIn details, company websites, and even hiring data to inform upon your next big move. Prelo even comes with Email templates that have been tested and optimized to connect and convert. 

Get Prelo Standard Plan: Lifetime Subscription for $47.99 (Reg. $1800) with coupon code GREEN20. 

Prices subject to change.
